title: Mulch Promo Guidelines
content: Mulch promo 15% off seasonal cleanup packages with bundled bed edging tips. Mention early-booking discount to lock pricing.

title: Acme HOA Summary
content: Acme HOA requesting mulch promo follow-up; stage Proposal with rep Marcus Tillman.

title: Mulch Upsell Script
content: Mention the 15% mulch promo if they book before Friday.
